title: Silent Hill Soundtrack Collection (mainly songs with vocal) by T
description:
A compilation of beautiful music of Silent Hill OST by Akira Yamaoka. 

Songs with vocals by Mary Elizabeth McGlynn and Joe Romersa plus a few instrumental tracks. 

Complete with tags and my custom artwork. 

192-256kbps. 

Enjoy and seed!

Track list:

1. Silent Hill
2. Letter - From the Lost Days
3. Cradle of Forest
4. Theme of Laura 
5. One More Soul to the Call
6. Elle Theme
7. I Want Love
8. This Sacred Line
9. Promise
10. You're Not Here
11. O.R.T.
12. Tender Sugar
13. Your Rain
14. Theme of Laura (Reprise)
15. Room of Angel
16. When You're Gone
17. Blow Back
18. Promise (Reprise)
19. Alex Theme
20. Waiting For You (Live)
21. Hell Frozen Rain
22. Acceptance
23. Hole in the Sky
24. Melancholy Requiem
25. Shot Down in Flames
26. Silent Scream
27. Walk on Vanity Ruins
28. Hometown




Don't just hit and run- SEED please:)
